abstract: UBS said earnings would remain at risk because of its exposure to illiquid and choppy markets, and it revised up its 2008 net loss, the biggest in Swiss corporate history, to include a large United States tax fine and extra write-downs, Reuters said.
lead_paragraph: UBS said earnings would remain at risk because of its exposure to illiquid and choppy markets, and it revised up its 2008 net loss, the biggest in Swiss corporate history, to include a large United States tax fine and extra write-downs, Reuters said.

headline.main: UBS Expects Earnings at Risk and Ups 2008 Net Loss
